OOC: This is the beginning of the first storyline. We hope you will 
enjoy it. Remember that there are NPCs starting in it. Play your 
characters and have fun!

Bic:

Space ever was cold. The transformer knew it and in fact enjoyed it. 
Unlike some of his brothers and sisters, he was pleased by the 
loneliness of the Great Void.

He scanned the place. This system was huge, and there were many 
interesting resources around. One of the most promising was this gas 
giant and its 16 moons. It would hold great significance for them...

However, his long range scanners detected something even better. 
Energon. Energon! ENERGON FOR THE ANCIENTS' SAKE! The Master would 
like that...

His meteorite form moved to a new trajectory and with astonishing 
speed, he burst forward to this undiscovered planet. However, as he 
came closer, he recognized something... Tranformers, cybertronian 
transformers! He sent a message.

???????: Master, I have discovered a planetful of energon. However, 
there are Cybertronians crawling on its surface like flies on a 
rotting piece of meat. I would suggest you send Sister Lunekill to 
eradicate their threat.

A deep voice answered him, from another part of the galaxy.

???????: A wise decision, Rockseeker, my minion. I will send her to 
you. Continue your prospecting for now.

With that, Rockseeker flew down on the planet and went on the top of 
the highest mountain to complete his survey.
